casebody.data:
SABLE
v.
SABLE. No. 351P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 11, 2006. Lynne M. Kay, for D. Stella Sable.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of July 2006 by Plaintiff for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of July 2006."
